blogPost.excerpt: Confetti is a colorful habit tracker that tracks your daily/weekly habits & to-dos and launches confetti for every completion to celebrate your daily accomplishments. Confetti also makes it easy to visualize your progress over time with in-depth stats.
blogPost.body: Confetti is a colorful habit tracker that tracks your daily/weekly habits & to-dos and launches confetti for every completion to celebrate your daily accomplishments. Confetti also makes it easy to visualize your progress over time with in-depth stats.
blogPost.title: Confetti iOS + Android - Develop good habits and eliminate bad ones
blogPost.author: Danny Sapio

localize.description: 五彩纸屑是一个五颜六色的习惯跟踪器，它跟踪你每天/每周的习惯和待办事项，并在每次完成时推出五彩纸屑来庆祝你的日常成就。五彩纸屑还可以很容易地通过深入的统计数据直观地显示您随着时间的推移的进展情况。
localize.tagline: 养成好习惯，改掉坏习惯

localize.description: 五彩紙屑是一個五顏六色的習慣跟蹤器，它跟蹤你每天/每週的習慣和待辦事項，並在每次完成時推出五彩紙屑來慶祝你的日常成就。五彩紙屑還可以很容易地通過深入的統計數據直觀地顯示您隨着時間的推移的進展情況。
localize.tagline: 養成好習慣，改掉壞習慣

previous.excerpt: Create and customize minimally generated patterns or artwork to use for wall art, background images, print and other projects. Download your high-resolution art for free. Start making your art at https://tabbied.com

next.excerpt: Sponsorware for Github is the easiest way to sell access to your private repositories on Github with Github Sponsors. Get started in minutes and start selling your software on Github today!
next.title: Sponsorware for Github - Sell access to Github repositories with Github Sponsors.

localize.description: Github的海绵软件是向Github赞助商出售访问你在Github上的私人存储库的最简单的方式。几分钟后开始，今天就开始在Github上销售您的软件！
localize.tagline: 向Github赞助商出售对Github存储库的访问权限。

localize.description: Github的海綿軟件是向Github贊助商出售訪問你在Github上的私人存儲庫的最簡單的方式。幾分鐘後開始，今天就開始在Github上銷售您的軟件！
localize.tagline: 向Github贊助商出售對Github存儲庫的訪問權限。
